featured.text: According to a 2003 study, about 60% of a codfish caught in Iceland was lost or wasted during the production process for human consumption.
Iceland has increased their fish catch by 30% in the last 20 years.

definition.zh_def: 冰島是一個位於北大西洋的島國，以其壯觀的自然景觀和火山活動而聞名。
definition.en_def: Iceland is an island country located in the North Atlantic, known for its stunning natural landscapes and volcanic activity.
definition.example: Iceland is famous for its geysers and hot springs.
